naslov: Fantastična vila sa pogledom na more, Čelina, Omiš (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se jedinstvena vila sa panoramskim pogledom na more, Čelina nadomak Omiša . Vila ukupne površine 291 m2 ima tri etaže i tri stana  i nalazi se na parceli od 459m2 ,okružena zelenilom i borovom šumom, na mirnoj lokaciji, idealnoj za odmor. Na prizemlju i prvom katu nalaze se dva dvosobna stana ( apartmana) koji se sastoje od kuhinje sa blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom, kupaonicom, dvije spavaće sobe  i velikim terasama sa kojih se pruža pogled na more i otoke. U potkrovlju se nalazi jednosoban apartman koji čine kuhinja, blagovaonica ,dnevni boravak, kupaonica , spavaća soba, balkon i velika terasa sa kamenim roštiljem. Svi stanovi su potpuno namješteni. Kuća je izuzetno kvalitetno građena, na krovu su solarni panaeli, kotlovnica je u prizemlju, cijela kuća ima centralno grijanje, sve sobe su klimatizirane. U suterenu je garaža sa dva parking mjesta. Ispred vile je brižno njegovan vrt prepun mediteranskog bilja . Vila je kategorizirana (4zvjezdice) i u turističkom najmu više od 120 dana godišnje, te ima izvanredne recenzije. Uz vilu kupac dobiva i profesionalnu web stranicu. Odlična investicija, mini" tvornica novca". ZA DODATNE INFORMACIJE I RAZGLED NEKRETNINE OBRATITE SE: DANIJELA STOJČINOVIĆ GSM: +385989206268 danijela.stojcinovic@dogma-nekretnine.com Ne propustite priliku. A unique villa for sale with a panoramic view of the sea, Čelina, near Omiš. The villa with a total area of ​​291 m2 has three floors and three apartments and is located on a plot of 459 m2, surrounded by greenery and pine forest, in a quiet location, ideal for vacation. On the ground floor and the first floor there are two two-room apartments (apartments) consisting of a kitchen with a dining room and a living room, a bathroom, two bedrooms and large terraces with a view of the sea and the islands. In the attic there is a one-room apartment consisting of a kitchen, dining room, living room, bathroom, bedroom, balcony and a large terrace with a stone grill. All apartments are fully furnished. The house is extremely well built, there are solar panels on the roof, the boiler room is on the ground floor, the whole house has central heating, all rooms are air-conditioned. In the basement there is a garage with two parking spaces. In front of the villa is a carefully tended garden full of Mediterranean plants. The villa is categorized (4 stars) and in tourist rental for more than 120 days a year, and has outstanding reviews. Along with the villa, the customer also gets a professional website. An excellent investment, a mini "money factory". Don't miss the opportunity.
